# \_const

** Extends from [:link: node](NODE.md) **

Represents a constant declaration

-   `fullName` **[String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)**

## fromAST

Creates an array of constants

-   `ast`
